verbose_text: Consistent with results for the recF mutant, loss of ruvAB, ruvC, or recG also significantly reduces the survival of EPECDeltadarTG following expression of darT G49D (p < 0.0001 for each mutant compared with bacteria with each gene), while complementation of the mutants restores survival to wild-type levels (XREF_FIG E-4G).
